titles.title: Tax Equity Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for adjustments in the individual income tax rates to reflect regional differences in the cost-of-living.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/15/2013--Introduced. Tax Equity Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide regional cost-of-living adjustments in individual income tax rates. Directs the Secretary of Labor to determine and publish a regional cost-of-living index for each metropolitan statistical area.
